text: Google Tone is a Chrome extension developed by Google that when enabled, can use a computer's speakers to exchange URLs with nearby computers with an Internet connection that have the extension enabled as well."https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google- tone/nnckehldicaciogcbchegobnafnjkcne?hl=en" Chrome Web Store. Retrieved 2019-04-01.https://www.cnet.com/how-to/share-urls-by-sound-with-google-tone/ == References == Category:Google Chrome extensions
title: Google Tone
